key.name: Oh, you haven't completed your job advancement yet? Don't sweat it! There's still time! When you're ready for your job advancement, you should head to the $map:02000188$!

Many have come to the $map:02000188$ in the hopes of seeing the Empress. I'm sure there will be someone here qualified to help you advance to a new job. You should run over to the $map:02000188$ and ask around there.
Have you decided which job you would like to advance to? You might consider asking those at the $map:02000188$ with first-hand experience.
$MyPCName$, you completed your job advancement! Congratulations! I'll be rooting for you!
Hey. Yeah, you. Take this flier about $map:02000107$.
Say that you're not interested.
You don't need to buy anything! I'm just saying that maybe you should consider changing your style at <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000107$</font>!
A place where you can change everything from top to bottom! That place is <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000107$</font>!

If you go there, there will be <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000462$</font>, a part-timer who's handing out fliers just like me. <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000462$</font> will tell you how you can alter your style to become even trendier! Now, head on over!
Don't be afraid of change. There's no need to be afraid.
Welcome! I'm handing out copies of <font color="#ffd200">The Guide to Enjoying $map:02000107$ 100 Times More</font>. Would you like one?
Say that you're not interested.
It's just supposed to be a promotion of $map:02000107$! Is this your first time at $map:02000107$?
Ask what kind of shops are at $map:02000107$.

At <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000107$</font>, you can go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52000008$</font>, where you can change your hairstyle and makeup, <font color="#ffd200">$map:52000010$</font>, where you can change face, and <font color="#ffd200">$map:52000009$</font>, where you can dye your items.

In order to use the Beauty Salon's services, you will need <font color="#ffd200">Merits</font>. The different pricing options are a little difficult to explain here. For more detail, please go to the shop itself.
Did that answer all of your basic questions about $map:02000107$? If you're ever feeling a little down, please go enjoy $map:02000107$'s services!
Hey, can we talk for a second?
Ask what's going on.
I know this is a little random...but this is an emergency. How does my hair look? I just got it done at the Beauty Salon...
How is it? How does it look? ...No, no. No matter how many times I look at it, it just looks bad. I need to redo it.
Can you please go to $map:02000001$ to find my older brother $npc:11000331$ and tell him to bring money to $map:52000008$? I already spent all the money he gave me to do my hair.
Take the taxi instead of walking all the way there... The taxi isn't that expensive... The time wasted walking is a bigger waste...
Didn't leave yet? You do realize that the taxi will take you where you want to go that much more quickly?
You were looking for me? What do you need?
Relay $npc:11000154$'s message.
What? Ugh... Why does she do this to me? She said she'd behave if I let her tag along for the levee. But even though the levee has been canceled, she still insists on spending all this money.
If I keep giving her money, I'm going to be losing money faster than I can earn... Ugh...

Do you realize how popular cars are? With all this people in the showroom, there's simply no time to rest! I'm busier than I've ever been...but at least I'm getting tons of commission! Haha! With all this money coming in, I was even able to purchase a diamond ring so that I can propose to the one I love!
Ask who she is.
That's a secret! I'm planning on surprising her... So no one gets to know!
I left the box with the diamond ring with <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000011$</font> for safekeeping... I'm sure it's safe, right? Actually...just to make sure...could you go check for me?
Ask where $npc:11000011$ is.

Where else would be a banker be other than the bank! Hahaha! <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000011$</font> is inside <font color="#ffd200">$map:2000034$</font>! <font color="#ffd200">The building with a spinning Meso on top</font> is the <font color="#ffd200">bank</font>! Please ask if <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000011$</font> has the ring safe and sound.
My jaw is sore from talking to all these people interested in cars. Whew.
Ah, $npc:11000325$'s ring? Not to worry! It's stored somewhere very safe.
Ask about this place.
This is the Goldus Bank, where reliability and safety are our top priorities. We store precious items for safekeeping. You are also welcome anytime if you have anything that you want stored away.
Since there is a Goldus Bank employee in every village, <font color="#ffd200">a stored item can be retrieved anywhere!</font>
I was also curious as to how big the earthquake was! If you're also curious, take a look through <font color="#ffd200">the telescope next to me</font>! This is no laughing matter!
Did you see? Did you see?
Confirm what you saw.
Deny you saw anything.
It's no joke right? Isn't that scary? Just imagining that earthquake makes me tremble in fear!
You're not as brave as you look, eh? You're not even looking directly down at it. Do you know how to look through a telescope?
Say that you are not afraid.
All right, if you say so... Anyway, if you ever get curious, feel free to come take a look anytime. You'll be quite surprised!

The earthquake didn't just split the ground. You can tell by looking behind me, but the ground is now elevated in certain areas. Just happens that the place we stored the cooking ingredients for the levee was where the ground was most impacted...
Although some bundles fell down the cliff, there are still some that have fortunately remained on top of the elevated land.
Could you climb up and bring <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000063$</font> back? If you use the <font color="#ffd200">$skill:20000011$ skill</font>, you'll have a much easier time.
If you fall from a high place, you may hurt yourself. Be extra careful. It's dangerous.
Thank you so much! Thanks to you, we can at least send the cooking ingredients for the levee to $map:02000001$!
Hey, $MyPCName$! Did you hear the rumors? They say that there's going to be a special event at $map:02000123$?
Ask what kind of an event it's going to be.
To celebrate their alliance with $npc:11000185$, Goldus Construction is handing out their newly formed <font color="#ffd200">Maple Apartment Ticket</font>.
Ask if that apartment is any good.
I'm not sure yet... You're going to have be there to know... Free tickets are being given out... This is a can't-miss opportunity!
Ask where a ticket can be obtained.

<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000600$</font> at <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000123$</font> is handing out <font color="#ffd200">Maple Apartment Tickets</font> on a first-come, first-served basis. You should go if you're interested!
I've also only heard rumors about this... If you really want to find out some information, you should go see for yourself.
Hello? I am <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000600$</font>, Ms. Kim's assistant. Have you come to see the house?
Say that you want to receive the $item:30000145$.
Ah, I see! Well, I'll need to check and see if there are any tickets left. As soon as the news broke that free tickets were being handed out, people came like moths to a flame!

Oh! There happens to be exactly one ticket left! Here! Take the $item:30000145$. Use this ticket when you want to move into the Maple Apartments. However, there are some <font color="#ffd200">conditions</font> you need to know about!
Ask what the conditions are.
<font color="#ffd200">Those who already own a house cannot use the Maple Apartments!</font> This promotion was specifically started for those who have not yet been able to find a satisfactory home.
Ask how the Maple Apartments can be used.

If you click on the <font color="#ffd200">house-shaped icon in front of the Maple Apartments</font>, a contract will come up. Read the contract carefully and submit the coupon to move in! Quite simple, right?
And during this special event, <font color="#ffd200">supplies for designing your own special interiors</font> are being provided. Please enjoy the various amenities at the Maple Apartments!
Ask where the Maple Apartments are.
Ah! The location of the <font color="#ffd200">Maple Apartments</font>is<font color="#ffd200"> written on the ticket</font> that I gave you!
You must have put a lot of effort into your training. I know that the monsters couldn't have been easy to fight, but now, you seem to look like a proper Knight!
I will teach you <font color="#ffd200">how to become a stronger Knight</font>. This is of the utmost importance, so be ready to listen. Let me know when you are ready.

Do you want to know how to become a stronger Knight? The path to becoming even stronger is through <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>. There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

The type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill. Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials!
You must have put great effort into training. Let's see... Such strong shoulders and fearless eyes! I can feel the confidence! You now seem like a proper Berserker.

I will teach you <font color="#ffd200">how to become a stronger Berserker</font>. This is essential in becoming an even more powerful Berserker, so come talk to me when you are ready for the next step.

The secret behind getting stronger is through <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>. There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

The type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill. Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials.

Have you kept up with your reading? You are aware that Wizards must always be reading, to remain well-versed with the complicated properties of magic? Let's see... It seems like you've been studying extremely hard. You now carry with yourself the air of a proper Wizard.

I will show you <font color="#ffd200">how to become a stronger Wizard</font>. The advice I am going to impart onto you is of the highest importance, so come talk to me again once you have prepared yourself. Remember, Wizards must be able to quickly comprehend new information, no matter how difficult or arcane the issues may be... You know that, right?

Heh, dying to know, eh? The secret is <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>! There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

The type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>...
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill! Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials!

I realize how laborious the training may have been. However, it is important to pray upon the heavens during such trying times. I can sense that through rigorous prayer and training, the spirit of a proper, devout Priest flows through you.
I will pass on to you what is needed <font color="#ffd200">to become a stronger Priest</font>. When you are ready to listen to the good word, please come talk to me again.

There is no special secret to becoming a powerful Priest. Remaining true to the fundamentals, remembering the basics... These are the most important tenants to keep. Diligent prayer with a pure heart is a foundation you can rely on for the rest of eternity.

There are different ways to get stronger... And one way is through <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>. There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

The type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill. Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials.
Hunting all those monsters could not have been an easy task. But I'm sure you are now proud to be a member of the Green Hood! You even look like a proper Archer now!
I will now show you <font color="#ffd200">how to become a stronger Archer</font>. What I'm about to tell you is extremely important, so talk to me when you're ready.

So you want to know how to become even more powerful as a proud <font color="#ffd200">Green Hood</font> member? It's through the use of <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>! There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

The type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill. Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials!
I can tell you've been training hard! I can sense the essence of a true Heavy Gunner from you now!
Well then, I'll show what it's going to take <font color="#ffd200">to become a stronger Heavy Gunner</font>. You're going to want to remember this! Come talk to me again when you're ready to listen!

Heh, so you want to know what it takes to become stronger? The way to become stronger...is through <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>! There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

The type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill! Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials!
Hunting monsters isn't such a walk in the park, huh? How goes the training? Hm... I'm starting to get the feeling that you're starting to look like a proper Thief.
I will show you the way in <font color="#ffd200">becoming a stronger Thief</font>. This will be vital in your development, so come back when you feel prepared.

Heh, so you're eager to learn, aren't you? The way to becoming stronger lies in <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>. There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

The type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill. Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials.
...What's this? I'm not used to someone talking to me first... Ah, if my memory serves me correctly, I was the one who led you down the Assassin's path. How does the path of darkness suit you?

Your eyes... They seem ready to tread an even darker path. Very well. I shall show you <font color="#ffd200">how to become a stronger Assassin</font>. What I'm about to tell you should not be taken lightly, so come back to me when you feel prepared.

So, you want to know what is required to become even more powerful? The path to true power lies in <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>. There are specific materials required for <font color="#ffd200">skill upgrades</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is the most basic material.

Remember that the type of material you need, as well as how much of the material you need, changes from skill to skill. You can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> from merchants, so they're relatively easy to find. But it's not so easy to find out where to acquire other types of materials. Rumor has it that you can sometimes get different materials by defeating <font color="#ffd200">powerful monsters</font>.
Here's a <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font>. Open the skill window and use it to upgrade a skill. Look for a <font color="#ffd200">General Store</font> if you need more materials...
Don't think because I'm being nice this one time means that I'm going to help you all the time! All enter this world alone, and leave alone in the end...
Achoo! Sniff. Ah, hey you. Can you—ACHOO!—h-help me?
I have a pollen allergy... Achoo! The honey from these wildflowers is supposed to—achoo!—help with that.
Sniff. I can't even get close to the flowers because of my allergies… Achoo! Can you collect the $item:30000125$ from the <font color="#ffd200">wildflowers</font> for me? Sniff.
There are wildflowers all over <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000008$</font>, so there's no reason to go out of your way. Just pick some the ones...achoo!...near me.
Achoo! You've already harvested them! Sniff. Hopefully this pollen allergy will annoy me no longer...
Mmm, what a refreshing scent. I can feel my breathing has improved, and it's stopped my sneezing! Here, I've prepared a gift to show my thanks... Ah...ah...achoo!
Can you help me out?
Ask what's wrong.
We need to teach the <font color="#ffd200">$npc:99000041$</font> a lesson! Why? They're harassing people! Do we need another reason? You'll help, right?
I wonder why the <font color="#ffd200">$npc:99000041$</font> have suddenly increased in number?
Thanks. I feel like this path has become safer thanks to you.
Can I ask one more favor? There are monsters on the forest trail that connects to here, and $npc:11000410$ is dealing with them alone. Could you help?
I'll take care of things here, you should go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000010$</font> and help $npc:11000410$.
$npc:11000409$ sent you to help me? Thanks for coming! I was just thinking it'd be nice to have some help.
This forest trail is the only way to get to $npc:11000407$. He tells strange stories every once in a while... But that's why everyone loves to visit him.

The monsters have made it too dangerous to travel on this road. $npc:11000409$ and I are trying to defeat the monsters and make this path safer. It's a lot of work for just the two of us. That's probably why $npc:11000409$ asked for your help.
Well? Will you help me get rid of the <font color="#ffd200">$npc:99000042$</font> here? I would be ever thankful for your assistance!
It's not going to be easy dealing with the monsters. Don't give up on me.
You've already dealt with all of them? Amazing! I'll take care of the rest. Head on over to the town.
It's been a while... I see that your skills have improved. You're turning into a serious Knight now.
Have you been upgrading skills like I showed you? Don't forget to keep upgrading if you want to become a guard Knight for Tria and the Empress! I'll let you in on another tip today...
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

For example, you'll need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>. But these items are hard to find. You'll have to <font color="#ffd200">defeat elite or boss monsters</font> to acquire them.
I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> so you can try it out! It will come in handy when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
It's been some time... You're covered in scars, yet your eyes shine with determination. A true warrior becomes tougher through the virtue of their hardships.
Have you been upgrading skills like I showed you? I'll fill you in on another tip today...
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

For example, you'll need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>. But these items are hard to find. You'll have to <font color="#ffd200">defeat elite or boss monsters</font> to acquire them.
I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font>. It will come in handy when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
Long time no see! Have you been reading? A Wizard is nothing without his thirst for knowledge! Let's see... Your available skills have increased! You're becoming a true Wizard!
Have you been upgrading skills like I showed you? Allow me to share another tip with you today...
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

For example, you'll need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>. But these items are hard to find. You'll have to <font color="#ffd200">defeat elite or boss monsters</font> to acquire them.
I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font>. It will come in handy when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
Hello again. I hope all is well. Your available skills have increased through prayer and progress. I'm happy to see you becoming a true Priest.
Have you been upgrading skills like I showed you? I'm going to let you in on another tip today...
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

For example, you need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>. But these items are hard to find. You'll have to <font color="#ffd200">defeat powerful elite or boss monsters</font> to acquire them.
I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font>. It will come in handy when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
Good to see you! I'm happy to see that you've become a proper Green Hood! I'm so proud watching you progress as a true Ranger.
Have you been upgrading skills like I showed you? I'll let you in on another tip...
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

For example, you'll need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>. But these items are hard to find. They say you'll have to <font color="#ffd200">defeat elite or boss monsters</font> to acquire them.
I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font>. I hope it will come in handy when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
It's been so long! Are you having fun on your journey? Your available skills must have increased by now... You're well on your way to becoming a true Heavy Gunner!
Have you been upgrading skills like I showed you? Let me pass on another tip today!
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

For example, you need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>. But these items are hard to find. You'll have to <font color="#ffd200">defeat elite or boss monsters</font> to acquire them.
I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font>. I'm sure it will come in handy when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
Hello again. Your available skills must have increased by now, right? Good. You're well on your way to becoming a proper Thief.
Have you been upgrading skills like I showed you? I'm going to teach you something new today.
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

For example, you'll need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>. But these items are hard to find. You'll have to <font color="#ffd200">defeat elite or boss monsters</font> to acquire them.
I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font>. It will come in handy when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
...You again. What is it this time? Haven't I helped you out enough?

Have you been upgrading skills like I told you to? You must have some questions, searching me out like this. You'll probably keep bothering me until I help you out, so I'll give you a tip to shut you up.
Not only do you need $item:40100001$ to upgrade skills beyond a certain level, you also need <font color="#ffd200">special crystals</font>.

For example, you'll need items like <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> or <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100003$</font>. But these items are hard to find, as they are special. You'll have to<font color="#ffd200">defeat elite or boss monsters</font> to acquire them.
I'm going to give you this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100002$</font> so you can try it out! You can use it when <font color="#ffd200">upgrading active skills</font>.
Welcome to the Royal Guard. We're going to start with basic training. I'm going to show you attack skills first.
<font color="#ffd200">$skill:10100011$</font> is a basic attack skill you can use. It's powerful, and used to attack surrounding enemies by swinging a longsword.

You haven't forgotten how to open the <font color="#ffd200">skill window</font> to add <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10100011$</font> to a Quickslot, have you? Now, try practicing <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10100011$</font>!
Don't do a half-baked job just because it's practice!
Well? Can you feel the energy emanating from the sword? There's something you need to know when using this skill. It <font color="#ffd200">consumes SP</font> when you use it.
Always remember! It's important to pay attention to your SP when using the <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10100011$</font> skill!

<font color="#ffd200">$skill:10100011$</font> is a skill that <font color="#ffd200">consumes SP</font>, so it's best to use the <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10100001$</font> along with it, which <font color="#ffd200">recovers SP</font>. Things have finally quieted down...
Ask what’s going on.
The little girl from $map:02000203$ was going around town causing a scene for awhile. She was looking for "<font color="#ffd200">the person who left behind the Onyx</font>".
I think she was trying to return a lost item to its owner, but the owner can't be found. You can go see for yourself if you're curious.
Who knows? It might be someone you know. Might as well check it out.
Ah… My legs hurt… I've been wandering around $map:02000076$ for so long, but no one will come forward...
Ask what’s going on.
Someone lost this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font>. I'm looking for the owner... Say, do you know the owner of this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font>?
Ask what the <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> is.
Say that you aren't the owner.
Say that you are the owner.

It's important to have powerful items when going on an adventure, right? I'm getting ready here because I thought I should have at least one legendary weapon before I embark on an adventure.
Ask what she's preparing for.
I'm trading my own items for other people's <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> so I can use the <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> to boost my own items!

But then... A little while ago someone dumped a whole bunch of <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> and just took off. I debated with myself for some time, wondering if I should just keep it... But I was raised with values, you see.
But looking for the owner has been very difficult... Hey, do you want this stuff? I don't feel good about carrying it on me. You should take it!
Go to $npc:11000508$, or let's do an exchange for something I'm carrying! It's best to use up a windfall like this right away!
Ah… Really? It's just not my style to keep things that aren't mine... Why don't you take them off my hands?
Don't be modest! I'm not trying to pass the buck... It just feels like you're not bothered by this as much as I am!
Go to $npc:11000508$, or let's do an exchange for something I'm carrying! It's best to use up a windfall like this right away!
Oh, yeah? Why would you dump all of this stuff in front of me? You shouldn't tempt people like that.
Either way, you should consider yourself lucky. I was raised with values. That's why I was trying to find the owner.
Hello, $MyPCName$! Do you have a moment to talk about <font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font> and our professional <font color="#ffd200">maids</font>?
Ask what <font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font> is.

<font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font> is a company that provides training and job opportunities to the youth of Maple World. You could call us the best <font color="#ffd200">human resource development center</font> in Maple World.

You know that Maple World is comprised of various islands, right? Since Victoria Island is the central island of Maple World, a lot of the youth from the smaller islands often dream of moving to Victoria Island.

Dream Naidz helps young people in pursuit of the <font color="#ffd200">Victoria Dream</font> through our various <font color="#ffd200">human resource development programs</font>. Our program for developing service industry personnel is especially popular. I myself completed service training at <font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font> to become the wonderful guide you see before you.
Uh… I got excited and lost my train of thought. Anyway, you can talk to $npc:11000700$ to find out more.
You can find out more information about <font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font> if you speak to $npc:11000700$.
Hello. My name is $npcName:11000700$ and I'm here to promote <font color="#ffd200">Dream Naidz</font>. Can I help you with something?
Ask to learn more about the <font color="#ffd200">maids</font>.

For times when you're exhausted by an abundance of housework, or when you don't want to sit alone in an empty house, just hire a <font color="#ffd200">maid</font>! You'll have a chance to hire a <font color="#ffd200">maid</font> after you buy a house.
And if you ever need a maid or anything maid-related after that, come find me. I promise to do my best at finding the exact maid you need, $MyPCName$!

I've got to take the shortcut to $map:63000012$... I must meet with my colleagues who have gathered from across the land, to discuss our next steps. Go to $map:63000011$ and gather $npc:11001232[gender:1]$ and $npc:11001233[gender:1]$.
Who are $npc:11001232[gender:1]$ and $npc:11001233[gender:1]$?
Of Arazard's 16 followers, $npc:11001232[gender:1]$ and $npc:11001233[gender:1]$ are the most skilled... Wait a second... Why am I explaining this to you, of all people?
$MyPCName$, are you really messing with me at a time like this? Or maybe you lost all your memories after getting your butt kicked by $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?

$MyPCName$, get your game face on! Arazard, leader of the Runeblades, has lost his life at the hands of $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$. This crime unforgivable! Find out why $npcName:11001231$ has committed this heinous crime, and what he is scheming now. What are you waiting for?! Get to the $map:63000011$!

$MyPCName$, get your game face on! Arazard, leader of the Runeblades, has lost his life at the hands of $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$. This crime unforgivable! $MyPCName$! What's going on? After he heard you went after $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ on your own, $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ set off looking for you. Did you happen to run into him?
(Explain what happened.)

I see... What a relief. I still can't believe that $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ would turn on our teacher... I can't even begin to understand his actions. What he did to Aranzard is unforgivable. He has betrayed Terrun Calibre, and all of his Runeblade brethren!
Arazard wasn't just our teacher... He was like a father to me. $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$... You'll pay for what you've done!
Sorry... I didn't mean to ramble, but it's an emotional topic for me. Say, did I already tell you that $npcName:21900095[gender:0]$ asked me to bring $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ to $map:63000012$?
That's right.

$npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ is scouring the $map:52000015$ in search of the remaining Jibritta who follow $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$. I'm not sure when she'll be back, but in the mean time, would you help me gather $itemPlural:30000439$ at the rune magic communication tower?
Would you mind helping me gather $itemPlural:30000439$ at the rune magic communication tower until $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ gets back?

Ah, thank you! I suspect there are others of our order who have not yet heard our call for an emergency meeting. But...when the magic of the rune scroll runs out, the communication tower will shut down.

This whole thing is so stupid. The Jibritta, who specialize in rune magic, and we of the Pelgia, who specialize in swordmanship, have long been at odds. But never has our philosophical conflict come to such violence. And so, we have called for our faction to gather and deal swiftly with those traitors.

All of this infighting seems so unnecessary. To the modern-day Runeblade, the power of rune magic and skill with a blade are equally important. So drawing imaginary lines in the sand makes no sense. Say, where's your usual blade? Did you leave it while rushing to chase after $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?
I don't remember...

Sorry... You must still be in shock after witnessing Arazard's death at the hands of $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$... Here, take this. It's a little battle-worn, but it will serve well enough, until you find something better.
Hmm... What's taking $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ so long...? I'm worried something has happened. Would you go and find her in the $map:52000015$ and bring her back here?
Hmm... What's taking $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$ so long...? I'm worried something has happened. Would you go and find her in the $map:52000015$ and bring her back here?
Ugh... It was a trap...
They... ran into the cave... You must hurry...
Who?
Those damned Jibritta scum… $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$'s followers were here. $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ chased after them all on his own...
Ugh... Those Jibritta scum... $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ chased after $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$'s followers on his own. Hurry... Help him.
Oh! $MyPCName$! Are you lost? What are you doing all the way out here?
I came here looking for $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$.
Quit making excuses. If you really came here for $npcName:11001233[gender:1]$, you would've escorted her to safety... You knew it was dangerous, and yet you came here anyway...

Well, it's too late to turn back now. Now that you've jumped straight into the fire, you'll need to stay on your toes. $MyPCName$, do you remember the <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900031$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900151$</font> techniques?
I can tell by your vacant stare that you have forgotten. These techniques are the most basic of basics for Runeblade...
I can tell by the look in your eyes that you're beginning to remember... Show me the results of your training!
I can tell by the look in your eyes that you're beginning to remember... Show me the results of your training!
$MyPCName$! Are you okay?
What happened?

It seems they ganged up on you to distract $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ long enough to make their escape. I can't believe you managed to go up against the Eight Blades, the greatest of all Runeblades, and live to tell the tale. If it weren't for $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$, neither you nor I would still be here.
Here... $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ said to give this to you when you woke up. It should help heal your wounds.

Are you able to walk? $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ is waiting to speak with you. Since you're the one who last saw $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$... Well, there are a lot of questions that need to be answered.

Are you able to walk? $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ is waiting to speak with you. Since you're the one who last saw $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$... Well, there are a lot of questions that need to be answered.

How are you feeling, $MyPCName$? You look much better than I expected. Despite betraying our order, the Eight Blades are recognized as the greatest Runeblades of our time. It is amazing that you managed to survive their attack with all your limbs intact. It is a tribute to your training under $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$.
But enough pleasantries. Now is the time for answers. You personally witnessed $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$'s attack on Arazard, yes?
Yep!
Can you tell me any more about what $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ did and said during the encounter?
Well, he called Arazard a "hypocrite."
Hmm... A hypocrite...? Why would he have said such a thing to Arazard...?
Your teacher, $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$, has set off with a group of others to track down the traitors who attacked you at the $map:52000015$.

Wait just a moment! Where do you think you're going? If you're thinking about chasing after your teacher, then forget it. At your current skill level, you'd only slow him down. Until $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ returns, you must guard the fortress alongside $npcName:11001234[gender:0]$. These orders come not from me, but from $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$.
Until $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ returns, you are to protect the fortress with the $npcName:11001234[gender:0]$. These orders come not from myself, but from $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$.
Hmm? What was that? Hey, did you just hear that sound?
I didn't hear anything.
Hmm... Strange indeed.
I KNOW I heard a crashing sound coming from the direction of the $map:52000016$. But... that is a sacred place. We are forbidden from entering without express permission. What to do, what to do...?
We should probably go investigate.
I'm sure it's fine.

Right... That would be best. First, we should go apprise $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ of the situation. Why don't you go ahead and investigate the disturbance in the $map:52000016$ while I talk with him? If you're afraid, you can wait here until I return.

No... loud crashing noises don't just happen on their own. We should check it out. I'll go fill $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ in on the situation. You go ahead investigate the $map:52000016$. If you're afraid, you can wait here until I return.
All right. Go and investigate the noises coming from the $map:52000016$. If you're afraid, just wait here until I return.
Did $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ leave you alone again?
He told me to bring reinforcements to aid in the search.
Hmm. All right... If $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ says so.

Putting together a second search party is taking longer than I anticipated... And there's still the matter of speaking with our fellow Runeblades who have gathered so far. I suspect that $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ left you here with the intent of protecting you, but without backup, things won't be easy for him alone.

Though you may end up slowing him down a little, it would be better for $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ to have you by his side than not. Go to the $map:63000013$ and ask $npc:11001257[gender:0]$ to send you where $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ went.

Though you may end up slowing him down a little, it would be better for $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ to have you by his side than not. Go to the $map:63000013$ and ask $npc:11001257[gender:0]$ to send you where $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ went.
Hmm... Why have their been so many visitors lately? I'm running out of strength. <font color="#909090">(He sighs.)</font>
So, why are you here?
Send me wherever $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ went.

Huh? You want to go all the way to $map:2000001$? Hmm... It is very far, which means the journey will consume a lot of rune power... Well... If you MUST go, I'll check whether there's enough power left to send you. Wait here.
It looks like everything is ready! I can send you to $map:2000001$ at any time.
$MyPCName$? What brings you all the way here?
$npcName:11001567[gender:0]$ sent me.
$npcName:11001567[gender:0]$... He didn't have to... But, I have to admit...
I feel reassured with you here by my side, $MyPCName$. The future would have been hard for me to handle alone.
Although I was promised the cooperation of the Tria Royals, not sure if it's a coincidence, but it appears that many things are occurring throughout Maple World.
The mysterious explosion that occurred in the Door of Light region... The reports of abnormal behavior of monsters all over Maple World...
I think these occurrences have something to do with Holstatt's betryal. Because of this, we have to track Holstatt and at the same time investigate the abnormal events occurring in Maple World.
$MyPCName$, please investigate Maple World while the Terrun Calibre and I track Holstatt. Would you be able to do this?
Yes, I can.
I admire your strength to carry on, even after everything you've gone through.
All right, you go ahead to $map:02000062$ and join the open court caravan unit.
The goal is to check if there are any items among the court goods that Holstatt might have an eye on.
Safely escorting the caravan to Tria honors the new alliance with the Terrun Calibre and also is a good chance to show your strength as a Runeblade.
Your first mission is quite a big one. As your teacher, I hope you will grow through this mission.
See you again, $MyPCName$.

Hmm... At this point, don't you think you should use it like a Runeblade? You can only be sure it fits your body if you spin quickly with <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900031$</font>, like a true Runeblade.

Hmm... At this point, don't you think you should use it like a Runeblade? You can only be sure it fits your body if you spin quickly with <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900031$</font>, like a true Runeblade.
Very good. Using that technique, you should be able to defeat multiple nearby enemies at once.
Let's try using <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900151$</font> one more time, just to be sure you've got it down pat. Crush your foes with the fury of your blade!
Let's try using <font color="#ffd200">$skill:10900151$</font> one more time, just to be sure you've got it down pat. Crush your foes with the fury of your blade!
Very good. It seems as though that blade was truly forged for you.
I need some time to think about how to clean up this little mess you've made.
(Grab $npc:11001623[gender:0]$ by the collar.)
Oh my, another customer! I'm surprised you found your way to this little island.

There's no better way to relax than to cast your line while drinking in the scent of the ocean... Anyhow, welcome. Seems like this is your first time around here. Allow me to give you this fishing rod as a gift. It may be a little worn in, but it'll reel them in fine!
So many fish biting today, all you've gotta do is cast your line. What are you waiting for? Get that line in some water!
What's wrong? Are the fish not biting?
I don't own a fishing pole.
I'm just stopping to take a breather.
Listen $male:friend,female:little lady$, I like you plenty, but I'm not exactly swimming in spare gear over here. If you really don't got any fishing tackle, I'd be happy to sell you some.
Ah, I see. Can't say I blame you! Heck of a sight, isn't it? Stay as long as you like.
Well, what do you think? Satisfying, isn't it?

Hm... I just can't figure it out...
Is something wrong?
Is something wrong...? Take a look around. Can't you see the murky water full of algae? Some time ago, the water started to become polluted. Now it's all that way. Sigh...

Since then, the number of fishermen who visit the area has noticeably decreased... I was also debating whether to leave or not. That's when... I saw a peculiar thing in the muddy water that I have never seen before.
I'm still here because a part of me is determined to catch that peculiar thing and find out what exactly it is. Aren't you curious as well? What could it be... Won't you try and catch it with me?
Why are you standing there like that?
I don't have any fishing stuff.
I'm just resting for a bit.
Yeah? Is that so? I didn't pick my money off a tree, so I can't give you another one for free... But if you need one, you can purchase it at production cost. Heh...
The place isn't even worth looking at anymore... Just go and fish.
A <font color="#ffd200">Shrubberpuff</font>? What a strange looking thing... I wonder if it always looked like this.
Oh my... <font color="#ffd200">$map:52000058$</font> was...a v-volcano?
It really is.
Are you hurt?
Uhhh... How are you speaking so calmly about what just happened? A volcano exploded and we barely escaped with our lives! Are you so in shock that you don't have a sense of the situation?
Yeah, I'm pretty used to this kinda thing.
<font color="#909090">(Takes a look around.)</font> Ask if this is heaven.
Huh... Seems like you're not a normal fisherman... The lava was overflowing when the volcano exploded and you didn't even blink...
<font color="#909090">(Shows a small, relaxed smile.)</font>
Haha... Well, you are... <font color="#909090">(Appears shocked while looking towards the lava canal.)</font> What… What is that!
What's so shocking?
J-Just now... Something came out of the lava and went back in! Here... There is something in here as well!
Look here, <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>! Look and see what's inside the lava! ...Yeah?
I am fine. What about you? Are you okay?
Yeah, I'm pretty used to this kinda thing.

<font color="#909090">(Shakes head left and right.)</font> You must have experienced a lot of shock... <font color="#909090">(Appears shocked while looking towards the lava canal.)</font> Huh…? W-What is that!
What's so shocking?
What's wrong? Worried the volcano will erupt again?
I don't have any fishing stuff.
Respond by saying you're the type of person who would bathe in lava if you had to.

Is that so? Well I didn't pick my money from a tree, so I can't give you another one for free... Luckily I was holding some of my equipment and therefore can spare a few to sell. You're free to purchase some from me.
Sigh... I didn't imagine you as a bluffer. Stop blabbing. If you aren't afraid, hurry and cast your fishing pole!
What... What's this! How hideous! A flaming fish... My goodness!
Let us hurry out of here! We should get to an expert and ask about this enormous thing!
<font color="#909090">(He looks you up and down.)</font> Hmm? Are you here for the audition?
I'd like to learn how to play an instrument.
Sorry, but class is not in session. These are the auditions for the Moonlight Ensemble, which will be performing soon.
Okay. I'm here for that, then.
<font color="#909090">(He strokes his chin and ponders silently, looking worried.)</font> Hmm... Well... Do you have any experience? Music isn't something someone can teach you with just a few words.
Don't look so disappointed... I'll loan you this instrument and music sheet to experiment with. You can practice on your own time.
Ah... Did you want to ask me something?
I don't have what I need to play.
I want to play in the Ensemble!
I thought I'd given you everything you might need, but it seems not. Oh well. You can always buy instruments and scores from $npcName:11001865[gender:0]$.

You will perform in the Moonlight Ensemble when I say you are ready, and not a moment sooner! Ah... Ahem. Excuse me. What I meant to say was... Keep practicing, and you will be on the stage in no time!
You're a little rough around the edges... But I'll be darned if there isn't a spark in you... What did you say your name was?
I'm $MyPCName$.
$MyPCName$...? I'll remember that. If you give it all you've got, eat your veggies, and practice every day, I think you just might have what it takes.
Have you been practicing your instrument?
Boast that others may lose their hearing due to your tremendous skill.
Say that performing isn't very fun.
Ha hah! Your confidence is overflowing! It's good to see you're enjoying music. Have you considered trying a different instrument? I will give an instrument as a gift.
Oh my... It would be such a waste of your natural talent to give up like this... Hmm... Have you considered trying a different instrument? I'll give you one as a gift.
Ah... Did you have any questions...?
Say that you want to perform, but you don't have the tools.
Say that you want to participate in the ensemble.
Ah... Is that so? Actually, $npc:11001865$ has come to sell new products to the people auditioning. Go and purchase the instrument and music score you need.
Ah... Is that so? There is still plenty of time before the ensemble performance, so it isn't impossible if you start practicing right away. Put in the effort, and you can accomplish anything.
Of course... You're a natural, just as expected. I hope you don't let your musical talents go to waste!
Uhhh... What's taking so long!?
Ask what's wrong.
Right now it's time for the <font color="#ffd200">Moonlight Ensemble</font> to begin... But we can't seem to get in contact with our piano player.
Ask when the ensemble audition was.

It was a few days ago... Did you not hear about it? When you didn't show up I was disappointed. I thought that you, <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>, had lost interest in performing... Woe was me...

<font color="#909090">(Realizes something...)</font> Ah! Of course! If you had participated in the audition, the piano performance would have been yours! There is no one who compares to your level of talent!
<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>! Please play the piano for the ensemble. Though it is a new piece...with your talent, I'm sure you will be able to perform it amazingly!
<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>! Please play the piano for this ensemble. Though it's a new piece, with your talent I'm sure you can perform it amazingly!
Bravo! Bravo! That was an amazing performance!
I only heard the news just after the performance started. The piano player had a severe stomachache and couldn't make it.
Anyways, thanks to $MyPCName$, the performance was a success. The next time there is an ensemble, earn your way in through an audition. I'm sure I'll see you soon!
Judging from those clothes, you've obviously never been here before. Welcome. I'm sure we've got something to elevate your fashion.
I don't see anything that's really "me" here.
There's no accounting for taste. Have you any idea how much love and care goes into each of my pieces?
I bet I could do better!

<font color="#909090">(She scoffs at you.)</font> Is that confidence I hear? Or arrogance? Fine, I'll humor you. There's nothing I enjoy more than watching the fashion-impaired make fools of themselves.

You simply can't design anything without a fashion template. If you're determined to embarrass yourself, you can buy one at the workshop. You know, the little button on the bottom-right corner of your screen?
<font color="#909090">(For the briefest moment, her eyes widen.)</font> That... Hm. That isn't half-bad.

This design looks perfectly adequate... at a glance. But how does it hang off the body? Does it even fit you properly? No, no, the true test of a designer is on the runway. Put this on and I will show you what I mean.
Have you lost your nerve? Very well. I shall accept your defeat.
Well... It fit you... because you're the one who made it. That's the only reason that outfit looks even half-passable on you.
You insist on playing at fashion design? Fine. Even I have to admit that you have some small, small kernel of talent.
Allow me to introduce you to the League of Fashionistas. But first, I insist that you take a new profile picture to show off your outfit. We don't want to make a bad first impression, now, do we?
Allow me to introduce you to the League of Fashionistas. But first, I insist that you take a new profile picture to show off your new outfit. We don't want to make a bad first impression, now, do we?
Ha. You look better in photographs than you do in real life. Perhaps... perhaps we could work together, after all.
Hey! It's $MyPCName$! Don't say a word, you beautiful dummy. I know exactly what you're here for.
(Stare at her in silence.)
There's no need to get flustered. I'll teach you the basics. First, take these materials. Let's try making something simple!
What was what? Is there a problem?
Umm... I lost the materials.
What's the deal with this place?

What!? How could you lose them? Did you think because I gave them to you for free, that they were worthless, and safe to throw out? Well I've got news for you, $male:mister,female:lady$. From now on, you're paying for your own materials.
Hmm? You don't know? It's a handicraft workshop. Aren't you here to learn how to handicraft?
Actually, I was just sort of wandering around.
What? (Her eyebrow twitches with subdued rage.)
<font color="#909090">(She clears her throat, then smiles.)</font> No matter! What's important is that you are here. What you learn today will be just as useful tomorrow.
A ring! Wow! You shouldn't have. I think you deserve another lesson.
Your timing is perfect. I could use a hand!
Uh... Okay?
I came to gather materials for a special order that just came into the shop. I have no problem getting my hands dirty, but I can only mine so much on my own!
There's a material found primarily here in $map:63000046$ known as $item:33000023$. I need a lot of it. How would you like to help me mine them? You'll be rewarded, of course.
There's a material found primarily here in $map:63000046$ known as $itemPlural:33000023$. I need a large number of them. How would you like to help me mine them? You'll be rewarded, of course.
Thank you so much for your help! You should swing by the workshop again some time. I'll teach you all about handicrafting!
Oh my! Where has the time gone? $MyPCName$, I'd love to teach you more of my wondrous handicraft techniques... But I'm afraid I have an appointment to make.
My older sister is a famous blacksmith at $map:02000203$. I was on my way to ask her to enchant one of my items when you stopped by...
Hey, this is a great chance for you to try enchanting something. I could sell you something to enchant, if you want!
Well? What do you think? It's only been enchanted once, but it looks good, right?
Anyway, we can't stop here. Let's enchant something else!
Anyway, we can't stop here. Let's enchant something else!
Not bad, huh? You know, this place isn't half bad. I should move the forge here! Ha!
<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>, we meet again!
Ask the reason for being here.

Why, what other reason do I have to leave the workshop and come here? I'm here to grab reforging materials, of course. This time I came to get a special material needed to decorate a piece of my own handiwork.

$map:63000046$ isn't very big; however, geographically, there is a variety of soil. In $map:02000076$ it can be difficult to purchase materials only found in <font color="#ffd200">deep forests like $map:02000023$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">beaches like $map:02000062$</font>. Even for a premium...

Luckily, although there isn't much variety here, you can purchase materials that can't be easily found in the $map:02000076$ meadow. <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>, won't you help me find the materials? At least for the sake of experience?

If you go <font color="#ffd200">downward</font>, you''ll come across a <font color="#ffd200">small forest</font> containing a mysterious energy. Further down you'll find a <font color="#ffd200">cozy little beach</font>. Will you collect <font color="#ffd200">$item:33000024$</font> in the forest and <font color="#ffd200">$item:33000025$</font> on the beach for me?
Wow! Thank you very much. You have helped me countless times...
Hmm... I can't leave the workshop empty for so long. That would be quite a problem.
Ask if there is any reason to not return to the workshop.

The thing is...I have received more reforging orders than I can handle. I do not have enough materials. To meet the requests, I'll need to gather a lot more materials, and quickly. <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>, think you have it in you to help me again?

The thing is...I have received more reforging orders than I can handle. I do not have enough materials. To meet the requests, I'll need to gather a lot more materials, and quickly. <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>, think you have it in you to help me again?
Is it too difficult? Ha... At this speed, nothing will get done.

This won't do. $MyPCName$, I will stay here and continue mining. Will you go to <font color="#ffd200">Nerman Barn</font> on the <font color="#ffd200">eastern side of the mine</font> and ask if <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001870$</font> has any <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000343$</font>? If so, please bring some back.

$MyPCName$, I will stay here and continue mining. Will you go to <font color="#ffd200">Nerman Barn</font> on the <font color="#ffd200">eastern side of the mine</font> and ask if <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001870$</font> has any <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000343$</font>? If so, please bring some back.
Huhuh. Look here, young friend! Be careful, for there is cow poop scattered about like landmines. Huhuhuh.
Okay, young friend. What is the reason you have passed through the cow poop to be here?
Ask if there are leftover $item:20000343$.
Haha, what's there to do? There aren't any left... Our only choice is to make more...
Say that materials will need gathered before they can be made.

Hmm, so materials need to be gathered... See the cows at that barn? Go and bring back a few <font color="#ffd200">$item:33000041$</font>. If you have raised livestock at your home before, you will find this to be similar.

Hmm, if that's the case materials need to be gathered. See the cows at that barn? Go and bring back a few <font color="#ffd200">$item:33000041$</font>. If you have raised livestock at your home before, you will find this to be similar.
Not that difficult, huh? They need to get haircuts every once in a while, but it's for their own good.
Now it's time to take <font color="#ffd200">$item:33000041$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">create</font> <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000343$</font>. It isn't difficult. Give it a try.
Now it's time to take <font color="#ffd200">$item:33000041$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">create</font> <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000343$</font>. It isn't difficult. Give it a try.
Ah, you have finally arrived. I've been waiting!
Hand over the $item:20000343$.

You see... The truth is after $MyPCName$ went to the barn, a passing guild member handed me the $item:20000343$ they had with them. Thanks to that generous passerby, I was able to collect this much material in a short amount of time.
You have worked hard; however, this is how it turned out... You can take that $item:20000343$ and use it as needed.
Ah! $MyPCName$. That $item:20000343$, how about trying it out here? You will be able to feel your mining speed increase immensely.
Ah! $MyPCName$. That $item:20000343$, how about trying it out here? You will be able to feel your mining speed increase immensely.
What you think? Makes mining much easier, right? I didn't decide to build a barn and raise cattle by this mine for no reason. Ha!
Hey...$MyPCName$. What are you going to do with the <font color="#ffd200">$item:33000023$</font>? If you don't have a specific use for it...maybe you can sell it to me? I will give you a fair price.
Say you understand.
Say no.
Wow! <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>, you're the best! Thank you so much!
Look, I really need this... Please help me out one more time. I will buy it at a really good price. Please?
Nod yes as if there's no other choice.
Hey, you with the face! Are you here to participate in the rally, or just to watch?
I came here to win!
I like to watch.

Is that so? Good, good! Well, unless you're planning to race on foot, you're going to need a vehicle. How would you like to burn rubber in my brand new, souped-up super car? It hardly ever explodes anymore. What do you say?

Listen, I'd drive it myself if I could... But let's face it, I'm old. I could break a hip if I fall out of bed. To think what the G-force of speeding down the raceway would do to my bones... All I can picture is a crushed bag of chips.

What do you say, kiddo? Won't you test my magnificent, high-tech super-engine? Once you start racing, you'll feel it: the need for speed coursing through your veins! Just, uhh... keep that gauge there out of the red. <font size="20">You know, experimental radioactive fuel and all.</font>

<font color="#909090">(He sighs.)</font> How could you come all this way just to watch? Wouldn't you rather race? You could be burning rubber in my new souped-up super car! It hardly ever explodes anymore. What do you say?

Listen, I'd drive it myself if I could... But let's face it, I'm old. I could break a hip if I fall out of bed. To think what the G-force of speeding down the raceway would do to my bones... All I can picture is a crushed bag of chips.

What do you say, kiddo? Won't you test my magnificent, high-tech super-engine? Once you start racing, you'll feel it: the need for speed coursing through your veins! Just, uhh... keep that gauge there out of the red. <font size="20">You know, experimental radioactive fuel and all.</font>
Go, go... Keep it up! Just don't go TOO fast. You wouldn't want what's in that engine overheating, trust me. Moderation is key.
Don't get mad but I, uhh, lost your car...
Don't worry, pops. I've got this race in the bag.
Y-you... lost my car!? Do you have ANY idea how many hours, how many mesos I spent...

There's the research and development costs, my assistant's monthly salary, hush money for my previous assistant's family... I'm not made of mesos, you know! The best I can do is sell you a new car at cost. If you're interested, perhaps we can make a trade.
Excellent! And if you manage to adequately test the performance of my engine, you can keep that prototype super-car. How do you like them apples?

Hahaha, yes! The car made it through the lap without so much as a mild explosion! Well, what do you think? How did it feel to be speeding along, listening to the roar of the engine with the wind whipping through your hair?
Wooo! Gotta go fast!
To be honest, I've driven more impressive super-cars.

It seems the reactor is stable after all. I'd like you to keep the prototype as thanks for your help. You shouldn't need to swap fuel rods for the next century or so. They're a bit radioactive, but, uhh... you weren't planning on procreating, right?
R-really? To fail after having worked so hard... Alas... I suppose there's no point in returning the car... <font color="#909090">(He lowers his head in disappointment.)</font>
Hm? Oh goodness, it's you! You're the young adventurer who helped me stress-test my race car super-engine before!
You know it!
Uhh... I guess so...
What a pleasant surprise! Are you still driving that car I gave you?
That's right.
Actually, I've moved on to shinier, fancier vehicles.
Oh, is that so? Still cruising around with your wheels on the ground, eh? Hahaha... Well then, you've come at the perfect time! What would you say to the chance to rule the skies?

Pending the results of a lawsuit, I've taken a break from my engine research and started looking into making flight more accessible to all. This is my first invention, a $item:40400001$. I believe I've perfectly counterbalanced the balloons for your weight, so you should be able to soar the skies without getting lost in the stratosphere. Give it a try!

Ah, is that so? Already on to a new and exciting mode of transport? Hahaha... Well, what would you say if I offered you an opportunity to slip the surly bonds of the earth entirely? Oh no, not death... I mean flight of course!

Pending the results of a lawsuit, I've taken a break from my engine research and started looking into making flight more accessible to all. This is my first invention, a $item:40400001$. I believe I've perfectly counterbalanced the balloons for your weight, so you should be able to soar the skies without getting lost in the stratosphere. Give it a try!
All you have to do is grab on tight to this balloon, and you'll float away! Follow the rainbow and fly to that other building way over there.
Hey, uhh... That wasn't the only balloon you made, right?
Do you have something else I can fly in?

Well of course I made more than one, any good scienti— Hey, wait a second! Did you lose my balloon? Sigh... Well, there's no use being angry. You can purchase another from $npcName:11001875[gender:1]$ for a marginal fee.

Err... Well, I came here to test my $item:40400001$</font>, which is why I gave it to you... But ultimately you can fly with whatever vehicle strikes your fancy. Just look at the other people flying around the rainbow.
Ahhh... Was this your first time flying?
Yep!
Nope!

Well, you've demonstrated marvelous control... You're a natural aviator! I'll report the results of the test to Doctor $npcName:11001873[gender:0]$. Feel free to keep that $item:40400001$ as a souvenir. Really they're just store-bought balloons filled with an experimental gas.
It shows! I'll tell $npcName:11001873[gender:0]$ how the test went. Feel free to keep that $item:40400001$. Really they're just store-bought balloons filled with an experimental gas.
Ah! Perfect timing. As a complimentary service, Goldus Real Estate is providing our customers with interior design assistance.
One of my dearest, trendiest friends will be coming by to help you with your interior design. I trust you'll give him a warm welcome.
And here he is. I'm going to head back to the office... Good luck to the both of you!
Hello there. $npc:11001876[gender:0]$'s the name, and interior design's my game! I'm here to help you make your house look amazing.
Hm... Let's start with the basics, and take it step-by-step.
If you head over to your home now, you'll discover one of our associates waiting eagerly to tutor you in the basics of interior design.
Ah, very nice. You may just have an eye for this.
Hmm... There must be a furnishing better suited to your home's aesthetic. Shall we pick one out together?
You can purchase whatever you like, and it will be transported here auto-magically in an instant! Why don't you purchase a furnishing and see for yourself?
You can purchase whatever you like, and it will be transported here auto-magically in an instant! Why don't you purchase a furnishing and see for yourself?
Hmm… The vibe in here is definitely improving. I have to hand it to you, you do seem to have a sense for interior decorating.
You can change the feel of a home drastically with the right furniture. Work hard to make your house a place you can be proud of!
Hmm... The place is... looking a little drab...
I'd like to give you a gift. It's a $item:50200299$. It's got a very practical and clean design, a nice starter-bed. Why don't you place it somewhere? It would really class up the place.
I'd like to give you a gift. It's a $item:50200299$. It's got a very practical and clean design, a nice starter-bed. Why don't you place it somewhere? It would really class up the place.

It's easy to tell a neglectful homeowner from a caring one by the care $male:he,female:she$ puts into decorating. There are certain furnishings which are especially good indicators of this, and thus, increase your home's decoration score. Take that $item:50200299$, for example.
You may have noticed that the moment you placed $item:50200299$, your decoration score increased. Your decoration score is a representation of how any tasteful observer would assess your home.
Decorate your home however you wish, but if you have any interest in maintaining a sensibly arranged home, you should pay attention to your decoration score.
The atmosphere in here is all off. I know! How about a new table and sofa?
This room... It's just not working.
Swapping out a piece of furniture here and there can drastically change the ambiance of a home. It's far easier than changing the wallpaper, and just as satisfying.
I have to admit, you're not half bad. Perhaps you don't need my help after all. Well, I'll be off then.
Ah, hello...? Is anyone home? I brought over a little housewarming present. This cuddly little chickie is yours to raise.
A little young to own a home aren't you? I like it! It shows forward thinking and dedication.

My name's $npcName:11001877$ and I run the farm up the way. I was passing by when I couldn't help but peep through your windows and notice how empty your house looked! So, I thought I'd do the neighborly thing and bring you a housewarming gift. It's a chicken!
Here, take it. If I had my way, there'd be a hen in every home! Really makes the place feel cozy. I hope you'll look after it.
Here, take it. If I had my way, there'd be a hen in every home! Really makes the place feel cozy. I hope you'll look after it.
I raised that there little gal ever since she hatched from her egg. Take good care of her!
SCRIPTQUESTGUIDE_1023200804001035_NAME:[F]ContentsGuide01
SCRIPTQUESTGUIDE_1023200804001036_NAME:[F]ContentsGuide01
SCRIPTQUESTGUIDE_1023200804001037_NAME:[F]ContentsGuide01
Look! The little chickie has something for you!
Look! The little chickie has something for you!
Hahahaha... What do you think? Caring for livestock is a lot of work, but it's worth it in the end.
Take good care of that little birdie. And don't worry... I'll let myself in once in a while and see that she's fed and looked after. Well, see you next time!
SCRIPTQUESTGUIDE_1121210204001206_NAME:[F]ContentsGuide01
SCRIPTQUESTGUIDE_1121210204001207_NAME:[F]ContentsGuide01
SCRIPTQUESTGUIDE_1121210204001208_NAME:[F]ContentsGuide01
Hey! Have you been well? The livestock is doing well? Oh... The animal smell is too strong at the house, huh? How about we go for something a little cleaner that requires less maintenance this time?
Hey! Have you been well? The livestock is doing well too, you say?
They are a bit slow, and therefore more calm and quiet... They are also low-maintenance, which makes them easier to raise. Good luck!
Have you been well? I have something great to pass on to you! I heard that if you harvest $item:33000027$ with $item:20000350$, the efficiency is much higher. First, let's try to make one!
Have you been well? I have something great to pass on to you! I heard that if you harvest $item:33000027$ with $item:20000350$, the efficiency is much higher. First, let's try to make one!
Wow! Your workmanship is excellent! Ha! Now then, it's time to harvest $item:33000027$ with $item:20000350$!
Let us begin! $item:33000027$ crumbles easily, so you need to be careful.
Let us begin! $item:33000027$ crumbles easily, so you need to be careful.
How was it? Much more comfortable than with your bare hands, right? Agriculture is a science, you know! Keep up the good work!
Greetings! Welcome to the Guild Registry HQ. I'm the chairwoman of the registry, and I'm in charge of overseeing all guild-related activities in Maple World!
$MyPCName$, have you joined a guild yet?
I wouldn't join any guild that would have me as a member.
Hmm... I guess I could apply to one of those.
Don't be silly! Guilds are a wonderful place to meet new friends, and besides, you get benefits just for being a member!
Just remember, if you can't find a guild you're interested in, you can always start your own!

That's the spirit, $MyPCName$! In addition to friendship and comradery, you'll receive all kinds of benefits as a member of a guild! Just remember, if you can't find a guild you're interested in, you can always start your own!
You can view information about your guild from the Guild window.
$MyPCName$! How does it feel to be a part of something bigger than yourself? Seeking out and interacting with like-minded guild members is the key to a fun and happy Maple World for everyone!
Here's to the continued success and growth of all guilds in Maple World! I hope I'll see you again real soon!
Welcome to our garden. Here, we grow ancient and endangered herbs. Just breathe in that smell! Isn't it magical?

Hm... Judging by that vacant stare, you weren't listening to my very important suggestion. Allow me to repeat myself. Go collect a flower from the garden and give it a good sniff! One hit will relax you, body and mind.
Go collect a flower from the garden and give it a good sniff! One hit will relax you, body and mind.
Ah, the subtle scent of the $item:33000166$. Lovely.
To be entered.

Ah, now this is a nice home! Ahem. Please don't stare at me. It's rude to stare.
My name is $npcName:11003142$, and I come bearing a gift from beyond the stars. I simply... had a good feeling about this house, so I decided to pop in.
That is how we make new friends on my world. It takes time for people to grow close. Perhaps as long as it will take this rice seed to grow.
Will you accept my gift? Will you nurture it and harvest it? If you do not want to, that's all right... I will simply return home.
Will you accept my gift and nurture it?
That is the perfect place for it.
SCRIPTQUESTGUIDE_0223175804001247_NAME:[F]ContentsGuide02
SCRIPTQUESTGUIDE_0223175804001248_NAME:[F]ContentsGuide02
SCRIPTQUESTGUIDE_0223175804001249_NAME:[F]ContentsGuide02
When the time comes, the rice must be harvested. Your dedication now will determine what you reap in the future.
When the time comes, the rice must be harvested. Your dedication now will determine what you reap in the future.
Ahh, that golden luster... It brings to mind the light of my world's star. I'm glad I came here to bring you this gift. It was the right choice.
